page.title: 10CHURCHES CONTINUED
page.content: The church has 5 bells.There are 2 memorials commemorating the First World War.There are many attractive stained glass windows in the church. The church has a Homere rose growing outside which is almost as old as the church itself.The worshippers at the church are locals.The reverend at Staplefield church has been vicar there for 20 years.He lives next door to the church in the vicarage. {St. Andrew's ,Warninglid.} This church is named after one of Jesus' 12 disciples. The vicar has been there for 6 years.He is also the vicar of Slaugham church.Services are held on the 1st,2nd and 4th Sunday's of the month at 9.15 and on the 3rd at 6.30.A bell is rung to call the locals to worship.There are usually about 25 in the congregation.
